display_html:
data HardForkBlock (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern BlockByron ∷ ByronBlock → CardanoBlock c
  • pattern BlockShelley ∷ ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c) → CardanoBlock c
name: HardForkBlock BlockByron BlockShelley

display_html:
data HardForkApplyTxErr (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern ApplyTxErrByron ∷ ApplyTxErr ByronBlock → CardanoApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrShelley ∷ ApplyTxErr (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoApplyTxErr c
  • pattern ApplyTxErrWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoApplyTxErr c
name: HardForkApplyTxErr ApplyTxErrByron ApplyTxErrShelley ApplyTxErrWrongEra

display_html:
data HardForkLedgerError (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern LedgerErrorByron ∷ LedgerError ByronBlock → CardanoLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorShelley ∷ LedgerError (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoLedgerError c
  • pattern LedgerErrorWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoLedgerError c
name: HardForkLedgerError LedgerErrorByron LedgerErrorShelley LedgerErrorWrongEra

display_html:
data HardForkEnvelopeErr (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorByron ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError ByronBlock → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorShelley ∷ OtherHeaderEnvelopeError (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
  • pattern OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorWrongEra ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoOtherHeaderEnvelopeError c
name: HardForkEnvelopeErr OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorByron OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorShelley OtherHeaderEnvelopeErrorWrongEra

display_html:
data OneEraTipInfo (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern TipInfoByron ∷ TipInfo ByronBlock → CardanoTipInfo c
  • pattern TipInfoShelley ∷ TipInfo (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoTipInfo c
name: OneEraTipInfo TipInfoByron TipInfoShelley

display_html: data family Query blk a ∷ Type
name: Query QueryIfCurrentByron QueryIfCurrentShelley QueryAnytimeByron QueryAnytimeShelley QueryHardFork

display_html:
data Either a b where
  • pattern QueryResultSuccess ∷ result → CardanoQueryResult c result
  • pattern QueryResultEraMismatch ∷ EraMismatch → CardanoQueryResult c result
name: Either QueryResultSuccess QueryResultEraMismatch

display_html:
data HardForkLedgerConfig (xs ∷ [Type]) where
  • pattern CardanoLedgerConfig ∷ PartialLedgerConfig ByronBlock → PartialLedgerConfig (ShelleyBlock (ShelleyEra c)) → CardanoLedgerConfig c
name: HardForkLedgerConfig CardanoLedgerConfig

display_html:
data EraMismatch = EraMismatch {
  • ledgerEraName ∷ !Text
  • otherEraName ∷ !Text
}
name: EraMismatch EraMismatch ledgerEraName otherEraName

display_html: type CardanoHardForkConstraints c = (TPraosCrypto (ShelleyEra c), HASH c ~ Blake2b_256, ADDRHASH c ~ Blake2b_224, DSIGN c ~ Ed25519DSIGN)
name: CardanoHardForkConstraints

display_html: protocolInfoCardano ∷ ∀ c m. (IOLike m, CardanoHardForkConstraints c) ⇒ Config → Maybe PBftSignatureThreshold → ProtocolVersion → SoftwareVersion → Maybe ByronLeaderCredentials → ShelleyGenesis (ShelleyEra c) → Nonce → ProtVer → MaxMajorProtVer → Maybe (TPraosLeaderCredentials (ShelleyEra c)) → Maybe EpochNo → TriggerHardFork → ProtocolInfo m (CardanoBlock c)
name: protocolInfoCardano

display_html: type CardanoHardForkConstraints c = (TPraosCrypto (ShelleyEra c), HASH c ~ Blake2b_256, ADDRHASH c ~ Blake2b_224, DSIGN c ~ Ed25519DSIGN)
name: CardanoHardForkConstraints

display_html:
data Protocol (m ∷ Type → Type) blk p where
  • ProtocolByron ∷ Config → Maybe PBftSignatureThreshold → ProtocolVersion → SoftwareVersion → Maybe ByronLeaderCredentials → Protocol m ByronBlockHFC ProtocolByron
  • ProtocolShelley ∷ ShelleyGenesis StandardShelley → Nonce → ProtVer → MaxMajorProtVer → Maybe (TPraosLeaderCredentials StandardShelley) → Protocol m (ShelleyBlockHFC StandardShelley) ProtocolShelley
  • ProtocolCardano ∷ Config → Maybe PBftSignatureThreshold → ProtocolVersion → SoftwareVersion → Maybe ByronLeaderCredentials → ShelleyGenesis StandardShelley → Nonce → ProtVer → MaxMajorProtVer → Maybe (TPraosLeaderCredentials StandardShelley) → Maybe EpochNo → TriggerHardFork → Protocol m (CardanoBlock StandardCrypto) ProtocolCardano
name: Protocol ProtocolByron ProtocolShelley ProtocolCardano

display_html: verifyProtocol ∷ Protocol m blk p → p :~: BlockProtocol blk
name: verifyProtocol

display_html: protocolInfo ∷ ∀ m blk p. IOLike m ⇒ Protocol m blk p → ProtocolInfo m blk
name: protocolInfo

display_html: runProtocol ∷ Protocol m blk p → Dict (RunNode blk)
name: runProtocol
